name: Gabe Newell Simulator

game.exe: drive_c/Program Files/Gabe Newell Simulator/Gabe Newell Simulator Demo.exe

content:
files:
- file1: N/A:Please select the Groupees archive
game:
  arch: win32
  args: -force-d3d9
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Gabe Newell Simulator/Gabe Newell Simulator Demo.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Gabe Newell Simulator
    file: $file1
- task:
    app: corefonts
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
